alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bladen, east central Robeson and northwestern Columbus Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Abbottsburg, or 8 miles southwest of Elizabethtown, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Elizabethtown, Chadbourn, Bladenboro, Boardman, Abbottsburg, Lisbon, Lagoon, Sidney, Elkton, Emerson, Southeastern Community College, Williams, Evergreen, Brunswick, Clarkton, Columbus Regional Healthcare System and Bladen County Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
